articles.title: About
articles.contents:
Bio
I am a PhD student at UCLouvain, Belgium. My thesis focuses on mortality estimation in uncertain settings using Bayesian methods. Demographer, interested in statistics, applied mathematics, science of science and R.
Education
Experience
